# LithTech API Documentation

## Overview
This is a Markdown reference for the LithTech SDK and related headers in External/LithTech. It de-glosses the public headers and presents Unreal-style class pages with signatures and header-based summaries.

## Start Here
- [SDK Overview](Guides/SDK_Overview.md)
- [Modules](Modules.md)
- [Class Index](ClassIndex.md)

## Documentation Layout
- Guides: `Docs/External/LithTech/Guides/`
- Indexes: `Modules.md`, `ClassIndex.md`

## Source Headers
Authoritative headers live under `External/LithTech/`.

- [SDK Overview](Guides/SDK_Overview.md)

- [Math and Geometry Types](Guides/Math.md)
- [Rendering Interfaces](Guides/Rendering.md)
- [CUI Widgets](Guides/CUI.md)
